overview: Collection of four short films from Nova. "His Little Brother" — Terry watches his big brother Les jerk off. Terry gets caught and the two suck and fuck.  "A Perfect Fit" — A store clerk helps a customer out of the swim shorts he is trying on. Nakedness leads to rimming, sucking and fucking.  "Pinning A Buddy" — Chris and Lee wrestle in jock straps. Floppy things that fall out are sucked. In the shower they go the rest of the way with rimming and fucking.  "Basket Practice" — Goofing around on the basketball court isn’t very much fun when you do it alone, so George is quite pleased to have Jim join him.
title: His Little Brother
